title: Which one is grammatically correct - share your feedback in the attached format or share your feedback in the format attached? - Quora

response.answer_text: Both have different meanings please. Share your feedback in the attached format. (Fornat which is attached ) Here the attachment is one only.i.e., format.. This format has to be shared. Share your feedback in the format attached. Here attachments are many. Among the attachments, format is also there where one has to share it.

I think they're both grammatically correct, but they both sound stilted and stuffy. Let me know what you think about the following: Please share your feedback using the format I've attached. OR Your feedback is welcome and can be submitted using the attached format.
